Class ChessPiece

java.lang.Object
Logic.ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class ChessPiece extends Object
Abstract class that sets common behaviours to all chess pieces.

      Getst the icon of a piece.

    • getPossibleMoves

      public abstract ArrayList<String> getPossibleMoves(Board board, boolean ind)
      Abstract method that gets the possible moves of a piece.
      Parameters:
      board - Reference of the logical board.
      ind - If true, only return moves that don't result in the king being killed in the next turn.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Strings with the possible moves for the piece, according to the board state.

    • getSafeCheckMoves

      public ArrayList<String> getSafeCheckMoves(Board board, ArrayList<String> allMoves)
      Gets the moves that don't result in the king being killed in the next turn.
      Parameters:
      board - Reference of the logical board.
      allMoves - ArrayList of Strings containing all possible moves of this piece.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Strings containing all moves that don't result in the king being killed in the next turn.
